title: Talking 'Blade Runner 2049' and 'Mr. Robot' With Sam Esmail (Ep. 194)
description:
The Ringer’s Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald review and celebrate Denis Villeneuve's ambitious new film, 'Blade Runner 2049' (3:00). Later Sam Esmail calls in to further discuss 'Blade Runner 2049' and other works by director Denis Villeneuve (26:00) before discussing the latest season of his show, 'Mr. Robot' (40:00).

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
